start.text: I don't understand why I can't sabotage them first before we fight.
Is it too late to blackmail them?
Too bad we can't use them for our cause.
Brass says to tag along, so here I am.
Not exactly my strong suit but ah what the heck.
With you all the way commander.

start_boss.text: I- I got nothing, not a bite of intel on that fleet.
I have the feeling they're not up for negotiation.
Is- is that the so called Zig- I mean, nevermind.

retreat.text: This'll put a bad rep on my name.
I'll leave the rest to you command.
I misjudged what the OpFor's capable of.
Not in front of the brass man, come on.
Debrief's going to be so awkward.

out_of_missiles.text: Are you sure we're out? Have you checked the back? Nothing? *Sigh*
With or without missiles, I'm taking them out.
If only blackmail has the same immediate effect as missiles...

engaged.text: Killing me won't change the fact you killed those innocents.
Turn back while you still can captain.
Strike here and here, then watch those ship tears itself apart.
If threats won't work then I guess I'll have to do this personally.
Should've listened to me when you still have a choice.
Why so quick to throw your lives into the void?
Might as well make this entertaining for me.

need_help.text: I would've performed better BEHIND the line NOT IN FRONT!
Command? If you could be so kind and lend a hand here.

pursuing.text: Could've become a valuable asset but, oh well *Powers up weapons*
Run, but you have nowhere to hide, my eyes are everywhere.

running.text: Tch, can't even hold my own.
In a mess right now, moving for cover.
Requesting assets to reinforce this sector!
Interesting odds, let's see how they play.

hull_90.text: Gah! They got me! oh wait nevermind.
Not so great of a start but still standing.

hull_50.text: This isn't anything like the espionage world!
My intel's leaking out SAVE THEM!

hull_30.text: I have a question before I go command
So many questions so little time.
I WASN'T MEANT FOR THE FRONT!
I can't die here! there's too many to uncover!
I'm starting to understand what the Luddic sees in death.

overload.text: Where do you even buy these capacitors?.
I never had this much flux and I still managed to overload? Jesus.
Alright who's in charge of flux he's getting fired out of the airlock.
I don't NEED this right now!

death.text: THE NUMBERS! WHAT DO THEY MEAN M- *Connection Lost*
You know where to find me *airlocks sound*
Officer, Leak every single blackmails, make them suffer.

victory.text: Hey that went pretty ok I guess.
Maybe I am meant for the front huh?

victory_boss.text: Words spread quick, we better disperse, command.
